## Interactive Maps using Leaflet

We're going to use the location of the New York Subway Stations in order to show the Leaflet interactive Maps

The data can be found in this URL: 
 https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Transportation/Subway-Stations/arq3-7z49



```{r echo=FALSE, comment=F, warning=F, error=FALSE,}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)

subway <- read.csv("DOITT_SUBWAY_STATION_01_13SEPT2010.csv")
subway <- separate(data=subway,the_geom, c("POINT","long","lat"), sep=" ")

options(digits = 16)

subway$lat <- as.numeric(str_replace(subway$lat,"\\)",""))
subway$long <- as.numeric(str_replace(subway$long,"\\(",""))


leaflet(data = subway) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(~long, ~lat, popup = ~as.character(NAME), radius = 1.5)

```
